reference.text: high-speed drum mills B02C19/11; domestic spin driers D06F; analysing, measuring or monitoring physical or chemical properties of samples during centrifuging, see the relevant subclasses for these procedures, e.g. G01N

note.note-paragraph: This subclass covers machines or apparatus for separating, mixing, drying, extracting, purifying, or like treating in which centrifugal effects are generated by rotary bowls or other rotors. Where such machines or apparatus involve pumping effects, such effects must be incidental or subsidiary to the treating.
In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: Centrifuges with rotary bowls provided with solid jackets for separating predominantly liquid mixtures with or without solid particles
with discharging outlets in the plane of the maximum diameter of the bowl
with discharging outlets controlled by the rotational speed of the bowl
controlled by the centrifugal force of an auxiliary liquid
discharging solid particles from the bowl by a conveying screw coaxial with the bowl axis and rotating relatively to the bowl

CPC-specific-text.text: with an abrasion-resistant conveyor or drum
Driving control or mechanisms; Arrangement of transmission gearing
with drive comprising a planetary gear
with feed accelerator inside the conveying screw
with baffles, plates, vanes or discs attached to the conveying screw
with special construction of screw thread, e.g. segments, height
with means for recovering the energy of the outflowing liquid

title-part.text: Centrifuges with rotary bowls in which solid particles or bodies become separated by centrifugal force and simultaneous sifting or filtering
discharging solid particles from the bowl by means coaxial with the bowl axis and moving to and fro, i.e. push-type centrifuges
discharging solid particles from the bowl by a conveying screw coaxial with the bowl axis and rotating relatively to the bowl
discharging solid particles by vibrating the bowl
discharging solid particles by bowl walls in the form of endless bands

CPC-specific-text.text: Centrifugal separators or filters for fluid circulation systems, e.g. for lubricant oil circulation systems

title-part.text: Centrifuges consisting of a plurality of separate bowls rotating round an axis situated between the bowls
Radial chamber apparatus for separating predominantly liquid mixtures, e.g. butyrometers

CPC-specific-text.text: with adapters for centrifuge tubes or bags
with means for adding or withdrawing liquid substances during the centrifugation, e.g. continuous centrifugation
having three-dimensional spirally wound separation channels
with hollow or massive core in centrifuge bowl
with additional elutriation separation of different particles
with filters in the separation chamber
with a displaceable piston in the centrifuge chamber
with fluid conveying umbilicus between stationary and rotary centrifuge parts

title-part.text: Centrifuges for separating predominantly gaseous mixtures
Centrifuges combined with other apparatus, e.g. electrostatic separators
Sets or systems of several centrifuges

reference.text: B04B5/12 takes precedence; magnetic or electrostatic separators B03C;

CPC-specific-text.text: amassing particles by electric fields, e.g. by agglomeration B03C3/0175

title-part.text: Centrifuges in which rotors other than bowls generate centrifugal effects in stationary containers

reference.text: drives B04B9/00; feeding, charging, or discharging appurtenances or devices B04B11/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Retaining arms for gripping the stationary part of a centrifuge bowl or hold the bowl itself
Devices and measures in the event of rotor fracturing, e.g. lines of weakness, stress regions

title-part.text: for separating walls of conical shape

reference.text: filters in general B01D; sieves in general B07B

title-part.text: formed or coated with sieving or filtering elements

reference.text: filters in general B01D; sieves in general B07B

title-part.text: Arrangement or disposition of transmission gearing

reference.text: dynamo-electric machines associated with centrifuges H02K7/16

title-part.text: Arrangement or disposition of transmission gearing

reference.text: for solid bowl screw centrifuges B04B1/2016

CPC-specific-text.text: Locking means between drive shaft and rotor

reference.text: for solid bowl screw centrifuges B04B1/2016

CPC-specific-text.text: Load indication with or without control arrangements

title-part.text: Arrangement of distributors or collectors in centrifuges

CPC-specific-text.text: with a plurality of scraper blades
with angularly and axially offset scrapers

title-part.text: Control arrangements specially designed for centrifuges

reference.text: control arrangements for feed, charge, or discharge B04B11/00

CPC-specific-text.text: Interface detection or monitoring of separated components

title-part.text: for cooling, heating, or heat insulating
for suppressing the formation of foam
for cleaning bowls, filters, sieves, inserts, or the like
for ventilating or producing a vacuum in the centrifuge
for forming a filtering layer in the rotary bowl
for drying or washing the separated solid particles
